title: Rental in Henderson with Right to purchase
posting_body: ['Great home located in Henderson with 3 bedrooms and 2.5 baths', 'Contact me to learn ore about this innovative Lease with a Right to purchase program.', 'Unlike many lease to own programs, there is no obligation to buy and no non-refundable option fees.', '45 Days from applying to move in day', 'Basic requirements to Qualify**', '*Annual household income of $40,000+', '*Stable employment', '*No history of eviction or other landlord issues', '*No pending bankruptcy', '*No disqualifying criminal history', 'Great home located in Las Vegs with 2 bedrooms and 2 baths', 'Contact me today for more information', 'David Berry', 'Realtor', 'S. 0194551', 'Berkshire Hathaway Nevada Home Services', 'Listing and photos provided by BHHS Properties']
